Performance:
July 1990: The Disinherited Son

Production: July 1990

Play: The Disinherited Son (夫婦善哉)

Scenes:

Teahouse Sometaro at Sonezaki (北新地曽根崎茶屋染太郎 / Kitashinchi Sonezaki chaya Sometarō)

Fry Shop at Gataro Yokocho (上塩町がたろ横丁一銭天婦羅天たね / Ueshio machi Gataro yokochō issen tenpura Tentane)

A Room Upstairs at Kuromon (高津日本橋筋黒門市場裏二階間借り / Kōzu Nipponbashi suji Kuromon ichiba ura nikai magari)

Café Salon Choryu at Shimoderamachi (下寺町電停前カフェーサロン蝶柳 / Shitaderamachi dentei mae kafēsaron Chōryū)

Meoto Zenzai (千日前法善寺横丁めをとぜんざい / Sennichimae Hōzenji yokochō meoto zenzai)

Characters:

Ryukichi (Ryūkichi / 柳吉)

Choko (Chōko / 蝶子)

Kimpachi (Hōbai geisha Kinpachi / 朋輩芸者金八)

Tomeko (Ochobo Tomeko / おちょぼとめ子)

Taneichi (Chichi Tanekichi / 父種吉)

Otatsu (Haha Otatsu / 母お辰)

Wodden lunch box maker's wife (Oribakoya nyōbō / 折箱屋女房)

Okin (Shūsenya Okin / 周旋屋おきん)

Kyoko (Musume Kyōko / 娘京子)

Otoki (Shūsenya Otoki / 周旋屋おとき)
